label.text: Custom form provided by custom mapping component

collection.name: Countries
collection.prototype:
select co.id, co.name, co.independence_day, co.population, co.description, co.capital, co.square, cou.name as country_union_name, cou.id as country_union_id from country co left join country_union cou on cou.id=co.country_union
where 1=1 ::where-clause
collection.counting-prototype: select count(*) from country co ::from-clause WHERE 1=1 ::where-clause

collection.name: SuperCountries
collection.prototype:
select co.id, co.name, co.independence_day, co.population, co.description, co.capital, co.square, cou.name as country_union_name, cou.id as country_union_id from super_country sco inner join country co on co.id=sco.id left join country_union cou on cou.id=co.country_union
where 1=1 ::where-clause
